attributes.action: Offer an immediate reduction in duty on both petrol and diesel to offset rising oil prices.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
People throughout the UK are struggling to meet the basic cost of living as a result of spiraling fuel costs. The Fair on Fuel campaign urges the government to remedy this through the reduction of duty.  

With over 70% of fuel cost going to the government it is simply not acceptable to say nothing can be done. The American government has recently reduced the duty on fuel as a means of controlling prices. For the good of the vast population of the UK we believe our government should follow their lead.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
